amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 115-518 to make U.S. opposition to IDA assistance for a foreign government mandatory if the government knowingly fails to enforce UN Security Council sanctions against North Korea.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Barr.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
